not spoken; not using words.

ಅವಿತಿಡು avitiḍu to keep from being seen; to hide; to conceal; ಅವಿತಿರಿಸು avitirisu = ಅವಿತಿಡು; ಅವಿತುಕೊಳ್ avitukoḷ= ಅವಿ1; ಅವಿತುಕೊಳ್ಳು avitukoḷḷu = ಅವಿ1; ಅವಿದುಕೊಳ್ avidukoḷ= ಅವಿ1; ಅವಿದುಕೊಳ್ಳು avidukoḷḷu = ಅವಿ1.
a linear measure.

any of a wide variety of bovid ruminants, with horns in both sexes esp. the domesticated one (Ovis aries) which has heavy wool, edible flesh called mutton, and skin used in making leather, parchment, etc.; a sheep.
